title: Can't login on new client but can on legacy client?
body: Title pretty much says it. If I log in on the new client I get an error message, but if I switch to legacy I can login. Friends of mine have also reported the same problem.

replies.body:
This could be because you're trying to login to the wrong region on the new client. Double check that you have NA selected if you're trying to login to your NA account. 

If that's not the case, let me know what kind of error you're seeing and I'll be able to troubleshoot more!
